"Akatsuki": "Our current range of activities extend to Stia's Fringes."
"Compared to Outer Mediola, the place is less dangerous."
"However, strong enemies appearing out of nowhere--particularly Dread Enemies--pose a threat."
"Dealing with them is difficult, even for veteran ARKS."
"For people who aren't suited for combat, it's completely out of the question."
"My platoon's been dealing with the issue head-on, but our numbers are overwhelmingly insufficient."
"Which is why I want you to join our sweep-up operation as well."
